alert.note: Alert for Aibonito; Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Ponce; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 18 at 11:13AM ADT until September 18 at 3:15PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Juan has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Aibonito County in Puerto Rico... Arroyo County in Puerto Rico... Cayey County in Puerto Rico... Coamo County in Puerto Rico... Guayama County in Puerto Rico... Juana Diaz County in Puerto Rico... Ponce County in Puerto Rico... Salinas County in Puerto Rico... Santa Isabel County in Puerto Rico... Villalba County in Puerto Rico... * Until 215 PM AST. * At 1013 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of rivers, creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Ponce, Guayama, Coamo, Santa Isabel, Salinas, Villalba, Aibonito, Juana Diaz, Cayey, Cidra, Arroyo, Los Llanos, Las Ollas, Jauca, Coco, Vazquez, Guayabal, Potala Pastillo, Luis Llorens Torres and Coqui. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.

area.areaDesc: Aibonito; Arroyo; Cayey; Coamo; Guayama; Juana Diaz; Ponce; Salinas; Santa Isabel; Villalba
